user.title: Choose your provider
user.description: Select the provider you want to use.

localai.title: Connect to your LocalAI server
localai.description: Provide the IP address and port of your LocalAI server.

ollama.title: Connect to your Ollama server
ollama.description: Provide the IP address and port of your Ollama server.

openai.title: Add OpenAI API key
openai.description: Provide a valid OpenAI API key.

anthropic.title: Add Anthropic API key
anthropic.description: Provide a valid Anthropic API key.

google.title: Add Google API key
google.description: Provide a valid Google Gemini API key.

error.handshake_failed: Could not connect to the server. Check you API key or IP and port

abort.already_configured: This provider is already configured. Delete the existing configuration to reconfigure
